snippet.title: Timberborn feature video: Modular Building System
snippet.description:
Heya beavers! 

With the closed beta coming in little less than a month, we wanted to take time and inform you about all the new features and improvements we made from alpha. In today’s post, we want to talk about the new architecture system. This system has undergone several changes, which we are excited to share. 

You can now stack buildings atop each other to create more efficient cities. Homes and warehouses, in particular, can be arranged into soaring wooden skyscrapers in various creative combinations. 

You can now also use scaffolding and strategically place stairs to colonize even the most hard-to-reach areas of the map. The new system will put your skill as an architect to the test as you design ever more intricate ways to place buildings and walkways efficiently. 

And yes, you can use the new modules to build your city on the water! This was one of the most requested features - at the end of the day, it’s a city of beavers, right? 

So, what do you think about the modular building system? Tell us in the comments!
